subtitle: Khadija poverty technical skills to win.
title: She motorcycle repaired
content:
Today we learn the story of Khadija. More will learn how the old concepts of vocational training, poverty, broken families said.

Khadija daughter of landless families in the northern Bagmara upazila. One of the children from school dropouts. He's repairing the motorcycle manufacturer.

Khadija Star (skill training for the growth of wealth) is a member of the program. This program gives vocational training to children from school dropouts. Khadija bryakaparibarera member himself. The mother of the owner of a cow. His brother BRAC school students.

The fifth-grade education due to poverty before the end of her, stopped going to school. She took a job as a maid in another house. Khadija would say that the destinies, he joined BRAC jhahdhat programs. Motorcycle repair training, he gets the chance. Many had to admit that at the beginning of the training. They said, 'What kind of a girl that stores will not work? "They said,' What is the use of this training? '

Khadija has proved them wrong idea. She dreams of one day of business will be to repair her motorcycle. His entire family will be poverty.
